attributes.action: Install baby changing facilities in men's toilets
attributes.background: It should be an enforceable law that companies must put at least ONE baby changing facility in male restrooms. You can find them in female restrooms, and disabled toilets but never in male restrooms. Men should have as much equal right to access of baby changing facilities as women.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to install baby changing facilities.

You might be interested in signing the following petition urging the Government to encourage public establishments to provide baby changing facilities for men: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123218
